1.title: Lucia Zorzi
1.plot: Of Italian origins, Lucia Zorzi has a bachelor degree in Portuguese, English and Philosophy. As a composer and instrumentalist, she sings in English, Portuguese and French on the streets of Paris or São Paulo, creating a delicate, charming and reflective original work based on the daily routine of her own life. Zorzi documents passages of her life through her musical works.

2.title: Picanha de Chernobyl
2.plot: When a band is in constant movement, its formation can change from time to time. But its founders are bound together. Matheus Mendes and Chico Rigo are close friends, like blood brothers who share the same philosophy of life, love for others, poetry, justice and social equality. In a charming and harmonious way, but not too nostalgic, the band seems to emerge from a documentary of the 60s and shows us that the values preached by the youth of those times are valid for today, including those great songs.

3.title: Emerson Pinzindin
3.plot: When a band is in constant movement, its formation can change from time to time. But its founders are bound together. Matheus Mendes and Chico Rigo are close friends, like blood brothers who share the same philosophy of life, love for others, poetry, justice and social equality. In a charming and harmonious way, but not too nostalgic, the band seems to emerge from a documentary of the 60s and shows us that the values preached by the youth of those times are valid for today, including those great songs.

locations: São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil::(street scenes)
imdb.plot outline: LOOKING FOR BUSKERS is a musical documentary series that shows the lives of virtuoso musicians, lyricists and singers, who produces original work of good quality and freely present themselves in the streets and squares of the cities, gaining with dignity their money through spontaneous donations from passers-by, and also being able to get instant answers from the public's acceptance of their works. Their lyrics and compositions of great quality portray anguishes, joys, opinions and thoughts about the new contemporary world.
imdb.title: Buscando Buskers
plot: Buskers produce the real soundtrack of the cities.::Edu Felistoque

LOOKING FOR BUSKERS is a musical documentary series that shows the lives of virtuoso musicians, lyricists and singers, who produces original work of good quality and freely present themselves in the streets and squares of the cities, gaining with dignity their money through spontaneous donations from passers-by, and also being able to get instant answers from the public's acceptance of their works. Their lyrics and compositions of great quality portray anguishes, joys, opinions and thoughts about the new contemporary world.::Edu Felistoque
